pages.text: Blacksmith Gavels are a useful tool. They can be used as pickaxes with a 30% chance of doubling the ore that they mine. Additionally, they can be used to start Rituals in the $(l:patchouli:forging/hephaestus_forge)Hephaestus Forge$().
Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Wooden mining speed and durability, and has only 1 ritual use.
Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Stone mining speed and durability, and has 3 ritual uses.
Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Golden mining speed and durability, and has 2 ritual uses.
Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Iron mining speed and durability, and has 10 ritual uses.
Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Diamond mining speed and durability, and has 30 ritual uses.

pages.title: Netherite B. Gavel
pages.text: Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Netherite mining speed and durability, and has 60 ritual uses.

pages.title: Reinf. Deorum B. Gavel
pages.text: Wooden Blacksmith Gavel. $(br)Netherite mining speed, better than netherite durability, diamond harvest level, and has 80 ritual uses.
